Good to know!
Our hours of operation are Monday through Friday from 9am to 5pm. We are closed on weekends and holidays.
Thank you for your order! Our standard shipping time is 3-5 business days. You can track your package by logging into your account on our website and clicking on the 'Track Order' button.

patterns: How do I return an item?
responses: We're sorry to hear that you're not satisfied with your purchase. To initiate a return, please log in to your account on our website and fill out the return form. Our return policy allows for returns within 30 days of purchase. If you received a damaged item, please contact our customer service team and we'll be happy to assist you with a replacement or refund.

patterns: How do I make a payment?
What are the accepted payment methods?
Is it safe to use my credit card on your website?
Can I use PayPal to make a payment?
responses: We offer several payment methods, including [list of accepted payment methods]. You can make a payment by logging in to your account on our website and going to the checkout page. We take the security of our customers' information very seriously and use industry-standard security measures to protect your data. Yes, you can also use PayPal to make a payment.
